Pre-Game Insights: The San Diego Padres are on a 3-game home win streak heading into the game against the Detroit Tigers.
San Diego has a strong team ERA in the NL, and Detroit has a solid ERA overall.
This is the third meeting between the two teams this season.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game is the third time the teams have faced each other this season.
Jurickson Profar and Riley Greene are key players to watch.
Others: Padres: Stephen Kolek, Ha-Seong Kim, Luis Patino are on the IL.
Tigers: Alex Faedo, Javier Baez, Wenceel Perez, Brendan White, Reese Olson, Sawyer Gipson-Long are on the IL.
